mapper.select: select bp.id,bp.code,bp.url,bp.name,bp.description,bp.create_by,bp.create_time,bp.update_by,bp.update_time,bp.remark,bp.del_flag, bp.paper_name ,bp.paper_id from biz_product bp where bp.id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_product ( `code`, `url`, `name`, `description`, `create_by`, `create_time`, `update_by`, `update_time`, `remark`, `del_flag`, paper_name , paper_id ) values ( #{code}, #{url}, #{name}, #{description}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{delFlag}, #{paperName}, #{paperId} )
mapper.delete:
delete from biz_product where id in
#{id}
